name: Discord Bot Builder
detailed_description:
Discord Bot Builder is an interactive program with a clean and flat user interface that helps people without programming skills to create their Discord Bots. Projects can be exported in a small folder size.

What is Discord?


Discord is a voice and text chat application for the users who enjoy playing games. If you know TeamSpeak or Skype, Discord is also the same thing. The Discord application is available for Windows, macOS, Android, iOS, Linux and Web browsers. You can download the application in the Discord website.

What is a Discord Bot?


Discord Bot is an "automatic user" which is controlled by the Discord API. Typically, they have more features than a Discord User. Bots can be a Music, Moderation, Giveaway, Entertainment Bot or something else. You can do many things with them, you just need creativity.
Seftbot is not allowed on Discord and you can be banned so I do not recommend you do this.

What is required to run my Discord Bot in DBB?


You will need Discord and a Bot Token, of course. In your Discord, you must enable the "Developer Mode" option in order to get the ID of an user, channel, server, etc... You can download the Discord application in the Discord website. To get a Bot Token, you need to register on Discord Developer Portal website. Search on web if you have any question.

Current Features

  • Create Events
  • Add notes to your Events
  • Add thumbnails to your Events
  • Copy and paste your Blocks wherever you want
  • Share your "Shares"

Possible Ideas/Features Coming

  • More Blocks
  • Easier User Interface
  • Steam Workshop
  • Steam Achievements
other...

short_description: Discord Bot Builder is an interactive program with a clean and flat user interface that helps people without programming skills to create their Discord Bots. Projects can be exported in a small folder size.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
